DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy tolerability/comfort brimonidine/timolol dorzolamide/timolol patient open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension . In investigator mask randomization process , subject allocate recieve either brimonidine/timolol dorzolamide/timolol fixed-combination monotherapy adjuctive prostoglandin analogue period 12 week . After screen , patient return baseline , Month 1 , Month 3 ophthalmic evaluation .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Fixed Combinations Brimonidine/Timolol Dorzolamide/Timolol Subjects With Open-Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.mesh_term: Brimonidine Tartrate , Timolol Maleate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 yr . Female subject childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test provide contraception . Subjects must confirm diagnosis primary openangle glaucoma ocular hypertension eye . Subjects insufficiently responsive IOP reduce monotherapy use either study medication deem appropriate . Subjects able complete questionnaire provide informed consent . Female subject pregnant , plan become pregnant study period , breast feeding practice reliable method birth control . Subjects wherein study drug containdicated . Subjects introcular surgery 6 month ( 3 month laser ) . Subjects know side effects/ allergy sensitivity component study treatment . Subjects uncontrolled systemic disease .
